name: The Real Housewives of Atlanta
overview: Umut vadeden bir moda tasarımcısı, eski bir "futbolcu eşi" ve arkadaşlarının drama dolu hayatına kadın kavgaları, kariyer hataları ve abartılı arkadaşlar damga vuruyor.

seasons.name: Sezon 3
seasons.overview: Model Cynthia Bailey ve avukat Phaedra Parks ekibe katılıyor. Kim, lezbiyen ilişkisini açıklamanın sonuçlarına katlanıyor ve NeNe'nin evliliği çökme noktasına geliyor.

seasons.name: Sezon 4
seasons.overview: Kandi ve Phaedra girişimciliğe atılır, Sheree hayallerinin evini gerçeğe dönüştürmek için çalışır ve Kim, Kroy'la birlikte bir bebek bekler.

results.name: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
results.original_name: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
results.overview: Popüler reality serisinin Beverly Hills durağında, dost gibi görünen ama birbirine düşman olan zengin kadınlar bolca kavga, alkol ve süs püs ile dramayı abartıyor.

results.name: The Real Housewives of New York City
results.original_name: The Real Housewives of New York City
results.overview: Manhattanlı beş ev kadını, toplumun seçkin kesimini temsil ettiklerinden ve başkalarının da bunun farkında olduğundan son derece emindir.

results.name: The Real Housewives of Orange County
results.original_name: The Real Housewives of Orange County
results.overview: A view into the lives of several women and their families who live in one of the wealthiest communities in the country with the viewer taken "inside the gates" to show their lives aren't always perfect.

results.name: Little Women: Atlanta
results.overview: These new little ladies turn it up wherever they go, especially with club promoter Emily Fernandez leading the charge with identical twins, Andrea and Amanda Salinas, Bri Barlup, Ashley "Minnie" Ross and Tiffany "Monie" Cashette. The drama heats up with these friends as catfights erupt among their feisty personalities and power hierarchies. Like many friends, they deal with problems with their parents, fights over men and one little lady even has a baby on the way. When it comes down to it, this clique is not afraid to get into it with each other, but together they face the daily challenges that come with being a little person while proving they are the true queens of Atlanta.

results.name: Hope & Faith
results.overview: Hope, a down-to-earth, happily married mother of three has her tidy world turned upside down when her celebrity sister moves in. Faith was living the Hollywood life as a soap opera star before her character was killed off.

results.name: Live Rescue
results.overview: Follow firefighters, paramedics and EMTs from across the country as they bravely put their lives on the line responding to emergency rescue calls.

results.name: The Real Housewives of New Jersey
results.original_name: The Real Housewives of New Jersey
results.overview: We head to the Garden State for this installment of the “Housewives” franchise, focusing on affluent Jersey girls who are more than just friends. The cast has changed through the seasons but the featured housewives through the years have included Caroline Manzo, a devoted wife and mother of three adult children; former Las Vegas cosmetologist Jacqueline Laurita, who is now a full-time housewife; and Teresa Giudice, a mother of four who runs her household without help from a nanny or personal assistant.

results.name: The Real Housewives of Potomac
results.overview: Just up the river from our nation’s capital lies a hidden gem—Potomac, Maryland. Its rolling hills, gated mansions, sophisticated prep schools, and exclusive country clubs all serve to keep the area invitation-only. Sprinkled throughout this community are a handful of old-line, wealthy African-American families who have historically broken racial barriers to provide a life of privilege for their children. In a town where entry is granted only through class, pedigree, and lineage, how far will the ladies go to secure their spot at the top of this prestigious circle?

results.name: In Living Color
results.overview: In Living Color is an American sketch comedy television series that originally ran on the Fox Network from April 15, 1990, to May 19, 1994. Brothers Keenen and Damon Wayans created, wrote and starred in the program. The show was produced by Ivory Way Productions in association with 20th Century Fox Television and was taped before a live studio audience at stage 7 at the Fox Television Center on Sunset Boulevard in Hollywood, California. The title of the series was inspired by the NBC announcement of broadcasts being presented "in living color" during the 1950s and 1960s, prior to mainstream color television. It also refers to the fact that most of the show's cast were black, unlike other sketch comedy shows such as Saturday Night Live whose casts are usually mostly white.

results.name: The First 48
results.overview: The First 48 follows detectives from around the country during these first critical hours as they race against time to find the suspect. Gritty and fast-paced, it takes viewers behind the scenes of real-life investigations with unprecedented access to crime scenes, autopsies, forensic processing, and interrogations.

results.name: The Chair
results.overview: Önde gelen bir üniversitede bölüm başkanlığına getirilen ilk beyaz olmayan kadın, İngilizce bölümünde zorlu talepleri ve yüksek beklentileri karşılamaya çalışır. (16 yaş ve üzeri için uygundur)

results.name: All Rise
results.overview: A look at the personal and professional lives of the judges, lawyers, clerks, bailiffs and cops who work at an L.A. County courthouse.

results.name: Queen Sugar
results.overview: Two sisters, Nova Bordelon and Charley Bordelon, with her teenage son Micah moves to the heart of Louisiana to claim an inheritance from her recently departed father - an 800-acre sugarcane farm.

results.name: Big Brother
results.overview: American version of the reality game show which follows a group of HouseGuests living together 24 hours a day in the "Big Brother" house, isolated from the outside world but under constant surveillance with no privacy for three months.

results.name: FEUD
results.overview: Kariyerlerinin başlarında başlayan , "Whatever Happened to Baby Jane?" filminin setinde doruk noktasına ulaşan ve adeta bir Oscar kan davasına dönüşen Bette Davis ile Joan Crawford arasındaki efsanevi rekabete dayanır.

results.name: The Cosby Show
results.overview: The Cosby Show is an American television situation comedy starring Bill Cosby, which aired for eight seasons on NBC from September 20, 1984 until April 30, 1992. The show focuses on the Huxtable family, an upper middle-class African-American family living in Brooklyn, New York.

results.name: Ufak Yangınlar
results.overview: Celeste Ng’in çok satan romanından uyarlanan Little Fires Everywhere, görünüşte mükemmel bir hayata sahip olan Richardson ailesi ile bu mükemmel hayatlarını tehdit eden gizemli bir anne ile kızının iç içe geçen hikâyelerini anlatıyor. Casual dizisinin senaristlerinden Liz Tigelaar‘ın senaryosunu kaleme aldığı dizi; sırların hayatlar üzerindeki etkisini, sanat ve kimliğin doğasını ve kurallara uymanın felaketlerin önüne geçeceğine inanmanın beraberinde getirdiği tehlikeleri inceliyor. 8 bölümden oluşan dizinin ilk iki bölümünü Humpday, Laggies ve Your Sister’s Sister gibi filmlerle tanınan Lynn Shelton yönetiyor.

results.name: Ray Donovan
results.overview: Los Angeles'in zengin ve ünlüleri, ne zaman başları sıkışsa Ray Donovan'ı ararlar, ancak Donovan kendi ailesinin neden olduğu sorunları çözmekte o kadar da iyi değildir.

results.name: New Amsterdam
results.overview: Amerika'nın en eski hastanesine yeni atanan direktör Dr. Max Goodwin, mevcut durumu değiştirmek ve hastaların hayatını kurtarmak için harekete geçer.

results.name: Legacies
results.overview: Bir Vampir / Kurtadam melezi ve atası olan Klaus Mikaelson 'ın kızı olan Hope Mikaelson, aynı zamanda güçlü bir cadıdır. Babasının son zamanlarında yanında olan Hope ; babası ve amcasının ölümünün ardından okuluna geri döner. Okul bir çok doğaüstü yeteneğe sahip olan çocukların eğitimini üstlenmektedir. Yönetimde The Vampire Diaries ve The Originals 'dan tanıdığımız sarışın vampir Caroline FORBES ve doğaüstü bilimler profesörü Alaric Saltzman bulunmaktadır. Dizide Hope 'un okulundaki yeni arkadaşları ve hikayeleri anlatılacaktır.
